Package game.dinosaurs

Class Pterodactyl

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor
game.dinosaurs.CapableActor
game.dinosaurs.DinoActor
game.dinosaurs.Pterodactyl
All Implemented Interfaces:
Capable, Printable, ActorInterface, Food, DynamicMovement
public class Pterodactyl
extends DinoActor
implements DynamicMovement, Food
A small carnivorous DinoActor that can fly.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private static DinoEncyclopedia DINO_TYPE
    Enum type that can be referenced for a lot of useful constants that are values for Pterodactyl attributes.
    private int flyingEnergy
    Current amount of energy left for flying.
    private static int INITIAL_FLYING_ENERGY
    Initial energy for flying that the Pterodactyl starts with when it is well rested.
    private static int nextId
    Id to append to a Pterodactyl's name to be able to differentiate between different Pterodactyls.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void activityDuringSpecialMovement​(GameMap map, Location location)
    Executes special activities (drinking water and eating fish) if the Pterodactyl flies over a lake.
    boolean canEat​(CapableActor capableActor, Location location)
    Returns true if the CapableActor is aggressive and carnivorous and the Pterodactyl is within its reach (not on a tree), false otherwise.
    void depleteEnergy()
    Decrements the flying energy if it flies during the turn.
    int eat​(GameMap map, Location location, int biteSize)
    Simulates the Pterodactyl being bitten / eaten by other Actors, if the Actor has a big jaw, the Pterodactyl will be consumed whole and disappears from the map, otherwise it will suffer a decrement in its health level / hit points.
    java.lang.String foodName()
    Returns Pterodactyl's name.
    java.lang.String getMovement()
    Returns the string "flies" if the Pterodactyl has energy to fly, returns "walks" otherwise.
    (package private) void initializeCapabilities()
    Initialize necessary capabilities of a Pterodactyl.
    private boolean isOnTree​(Ground ground)
    Returns true if the Pterodactyl is on a tree, false otherwise.
    boolean isSpecialMovementUsed()
    Returns true if Pterodactyl uses special movement, i.e.
    Action playTurn​(Actions actions, Action lastAction, GameMap map, Display display)
    Checks if the Pterodactyl's flying energy should be recharged, then invokes the super class's playTurn method.
    void rechargeEnergy​(Ground ground)
    Replenishes the flying energy of the Pterodactyl.

  • Constructor Details

    • Pterodactyl

      public Pterodactyl​(DinoCapabilities sex, java.lang.Boolean isMatured)
      Constructor.
      Parameters:
      sex - DinoCapabilities.MALE is Pterodactyl should be male, DinoCapabilities.FEMALE is Pterodactyl should be female,
      isMatured - true if Pterodactyl is grown up, false otherwise.

    • canEat

      public boolean canEat​(CapableActor capableActor, Location location)
      Returns true if the CapableActor is aggressive and carnivorous and the Pterodactyl is within its reach (not on a tree), false otherwise.
      Specified by:
      canEat in interface Food
      Parameters:
      capableActor - a CapableActor
      location - location the Pterodactyl is at
      Returns:
      true if the Pterodactyl can be eaten by the CapableActor, false otherwise.

    • eat

      public int eat​(GameMap map, Location location, int biteSize)
      Simulates the Pterodactyl being bitten / eaten by other Actors, if the Actor has a big jaw, the Pterodactyl will be consumed whole and disappears from the map, otherwise it will suffer a decrement in its health level / hit points.
      Specified by:
      eat in interface Food
      Parameters:
      map - map the Pterodactyl is on
      location - location the Pterodactyl is at
      biteSize - biteSize of the Actor that is trying to eat it
      Returns:
      amount of food points that the Actor that is eating it should gain

    • foodName

      public java.lang.String foodName()
      Returns Pterodactyl's name.
      Specified by:
      foodName in interface Food
      Returns:
      Pterodactyl's name

    • playTurn

      public Action playTurn​(Actions actions, Action lastAction, GameMap map, Display display)
      Checks if the Pterodactyl's flying energy should be recharged, then invokes the super class's playTurn method.
      Overrides:
      playTurn in class DinoActor
      Parameters:
      actions - collection of possible Actions for this Actor
      lastAction - The Action this Actor took last turn. Can do interesting things in conjunction with Action.getNextAction()
      map - the map containing the Actor
      display - the I/O object to which messages may be written

      super class's playTurn method
